4.4 License. You hereby grant, and you represent and warrant that you have the right to grant, to 420A3.com an irrevocable, nonexclusive, royalty-free and fully-paid, worldwide license to reproduce, distribute, publicly display and perform, prepare derivative works of, incorporate into other works, and otherwise use your User Content, and to grant sublicenses of the foregoing, solely for the purposes of including your User Content in the Site and Services. You agree to irrevocably waive (and cause to be waived) any claims and assertions of moral rights or attribution with respect to your User Content.

4.5 Feedback. If you provide 420A3.com any feedback or suggestions regarding the Site or Services ("Feedback"), you hereby assign to 420A3.com all rights in the Feedback and agree that 420A3.com shall have the right to use such Feedback and related information in any manner it deems appropriate. 420A3.com will treat any Feedback you provide to 420A3.com as non-confidential and non-proprietary. You agree that you will not submit to 420A3.com any information or ideas that you consider to be confidential or proprietary.
title: The copyright license that users grant this service is limited to the parties that make up the service's broader platform.

Excluding your User Content (defined below), you acknowledge that all the intellectual property rights, including copyrights, patents, trademarks, and trade secrets, in the Site and Services are owned by 420A3.com or 420A3.comâ€™s licensors.
